about_the_game:
Celebrate Fort Solis's first anniversary with this DLC and receive digital goodies for free!

  • additional game music (11 tracks)
  • additional artwork, avatars, animated gifs, backgrounds, wallpapers,
  • 2 short-stories expanding game's universe (one never published before)
  • in-game posters
  • main music theme video clip
  • and more
detailed_description:
Celebrate Fort Solis's first anniversary with this DLC and receive digital goodies for free!

  • additional game music (11 tracks)
  • additional artwork, avatars, animated gifs, backgrounds, wallpapers,
  • 2 short-stories expanding game's universe (one never published before)
  • in-game posters
  • main music theme video clip
  • and more
name: Fort Solis - 1 Year Anniversary Digital Goodies
short_description: Celebrate Fort Solis's first anniversary with this DLC and receive digital goodies for free!
